about_the_game:
All hail our newfound father! Rise into creation and rid the world of the non-believers! Did you think angels were not strong enough? Your faith will be rewarded!

Introducing the Faithful alliance! Part of the faithful faction; Stronger is always better. Generate extreme amounts of faith and use that faith to summon the strongest units in the game. Support you allies with powerful healers and blessers or convert your enemies to boost your faith production! Control the power archangel or wage war with an immortal chosen. Lastly, the two gods you will have access to that will change the way the game is played.

Includes the following:
Creator: A fast unit that heals completely every turn and can summon units from anywhere!
Risen God: The most powerful unit in the game, its power is equivalent to your faith and your believers!
More priests: A collection of support units that can convert enemy units to your religion!
Chosen one: A power unit that is capable of resurrection.
Archangel: The strongest angel, shrugging off almost any attack against it.
Cathedral: Generates a ton of faith per turn.
